sermons.description: Brother Sherebyah speaks on the topic of Double-minded Christians. He speaks most of the message in the Indian language of Gujarati. May we be single-minded towards our Lord and not have any idols and other things which we put in the way. The Lord deserves our 100% for He purchased us with such a great price.
